PersonalStatement.text: Kimberly Rogers, born on 1967-06-25, is a Male based in Debraport, American Samoa. He is Divorced and holds Thai nationality. Currently working at Novak-Olsen.

WorkExperience.text: Research Scientist at Smith Group from 2013 to 2017.
Senior Systems Administrator at Novak-Olsen, 2018 to present.

EducationAndTraining.text: Master's in Financial Economics from University of North Carolina at Greensboro
Master's in Engineering from Hanyang University

PersonalSkills.text: Innovation: Recognized for introducing novel solutions in data science projects.
Adaptability: Able to quickly learn and implement new technologies.

Hobbies.text: In their free time, he enjoys coding personal projects.
